name: Monosodium Glutamate
description: "The original oil painting will be sent to you wherever you are in the world." The advertising-oriented approaches of pop art have made the female body a part of the advertisement. Today's understanding of consumption is based on desire rather than need. Everything becomes an object of commerce. It is seen that the foundation was laid on the idea that art should reflect beauty, and those outside the mold were met with ugliness. Renaissance/Ancient Greece and Hellenistic period-based ideal understanding of beauty is an understanding that is still applied and instilled today. Especially today, the ideal female body, which is imposed by the increase in media use, is seen as a consumable object within the framework of the perception of beauty. Mixed Technique on Canvas, 135x90 cm
